includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: The gang return for an eighth season of award-winning dysfunctional hilarity as Sheldon returns from his travels, Howard adapts to traumatic changes and Penny gets a new job. Smash-hit US comedy series starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.
